sponsor.name: Ladybird Grove & Mess Hall
sponsor.description: Hip New American bar & restaurant offering a campfire-&-lodge theme, screened porches & local beers.

sponsor.name: Highland Bakery
sponsor.description: Southern-style cafe & bakery offering all-day breakfast, salads & sandwiches, plus fresh pastries.

sponsor.name: Historic Fourth Ward Park Conservancy
sponsor.description: The Historic Fourth Ward Park Conservancy is a nonprofit organization with broad-based community support dedicated to enhancing the maintenance and security of the park while advocating for the full realization of the park plan.

sponsor.name: Noni's Bar and Deli
sponsor.description: Hip neighborhood trattoria with patio serves Italian comfort food, plus a full bar & dance parties.

sponsor.name: Nandina Home & Design
sponsor.description: High-end home store with unique furniture, art, accessories & gifts, plus interior design services.

sponsor.name: Village Theatre
sponsor.description: Intimate, laid-back performance venue for live improvisational comedy.
